The largest continent in the world is Asia. With 43.810.000km², Asia covers 8.6% of the total land area of the world. In Asia are living over 4,5 billion people (January 2019), about 61% of the total world population. In total there are 54 countries in Asia. The biggest country of the continent is China with about 1.357.379.000 inhabitants (2016).
With 95,786,296 passengers in 2017, Beijing Capital International Airport, located in Beijing, China is the busiest airport in Asia.
